definitions.definition: To violate (something sacred); to treat with abuse, irreverence, obloquy , or contempt; to desecrate
examples: One should not profane the name of God.

definitions.definition: To put to a wrong or unworthy use; to debase ; to abuse ; to defile .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To violate (something sacred); to treat with abuse, irreverence, obloquy , or contempt; to desecrate
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To put to a wrong or unworthy use; to debase ; to abuse ; to defile .
